game.title: Forest of mysteries
game.objective: Uncover the secrets of the ancient forest
game.description: Travel deep into the heart of the ancient forest, solve its mysteries and fend off mythical creatures in order to bring peace back to the village near the forest.
game.reward: Ancient forest relic and 2000 gold coins

tasks.objective: Find the ancient tablet in the forest
tasks.description: The first step of this quest is to locate and retrieve the ancient tablet rumored to be hidden somewhere in the forest. The tablet has clues that can lead to the source of the disturbances.
Once you find the tablet, the forest guardian will appear. You must defeat the guardian to proceed with the quest.
